explains: adv. <非正式>从各方面考虑，通盘考虑
v. 考虑，斟酌；认为，视为；体贴，顾及（consider 的现在分词形式）
wordGroup: consider as vt. 认为（把...看作）
all things considered 从全面考虑
consider doing something 考虑做某事

sentences.en: We're considering buying a new car.
sentences.cn: 我们在考虑买一辆新车。

sentences.en: This idea is well worth considering.
I do not think he is considering Emma's welfare.
sentences.cn: 我认为他没有考虑到艾玛的幸福。
